"Tim": "Hey, you're one of those Meteorn. A skilled one too, from the looks of you."
"By the way, how well do you get on with other people? Teamwork is the most important thing for an ARKS."
"Well, we can talk about that more later."
"Hey, nice to meet you. I'm Tim, of the Team Support Staff."
"Are you a member of a Team?"
"A Team is... It's an association of ARKS who've decided to work together long-term."
"If its members are working as one, a Team can become stronger and stronger. That's why I've put together a little training program."
"Hey, nice to meet you."
"If its members are working as one, a Team can become stronger and stronger. That's why I've put together a little training program."
"What do you think? Want to give it a try?"
"Hey, nice to meet you."
"Ah, you've created a Team... Or did you join someone else's?"
"If its members are working as one, a Team can become stronger and stronger. That's why I've put together a little training program."
"What do you think? Want to give it a try?"
"...Oh? Looks like you haven't got yourself a Team yet..."
"Well in that case, my training program wouldn't make any sense for you..."
"Come back when you've found yourself a Team."
"You could create one yourself, and start recruiting members. Or join one created by other ARKS. Either works."
"I'll be here when you do."
"Hey, how's it going? Is your Team doing well?"
"Now, let me show you what I've got on my program right now."
